supplementary_data.transcript_list: SELECT t.gene_id, IF(ISNULL(t.version), t.stable_id, concat(t.stable_id, '.', t.version)) AS transcript_stable_ids FROM transcript t
supplementary_data.translation_list: SELECT t.gene_id, IF(ISNULL(tr.version), tr.stable_id, concat(tr.stable_id, '.', tr.version)) AS translation_stable_ids FROM translation tr JOIN transcript t USING (transcript_id)
supplementary_data.synonyms: SELECT g.gene_id, es.synonym FROM gene g LEFT JOIN external_synonym es  ON (g.display_xref_id = es.xref_id)
supplementary_data.GC: SELECT gene_id, value AS GC_content FROM gene_attrib WHERE attrib_type_id=142
supplementary_data.havana: SELECT gene_id, value AS havana_cv FROM gene_attrib WHERE attrib_type_id=380
supplementary_data.parent_gene: SELECT gene_id, value AS proj_parent_gene FROM gene_attrib WHERE attrib_type_id=520
supplementary_data.alternative_name: SELECT gene_id, value AS alternative_name FROM gene_attrib WHERE attrib_type_id=4
